entry.title: U.S. Seeks Drone Bases in Coastal West Africa to Stem Islamist Advance
entry.content: Africa is now the global epicenter of Islamist violence, and drones would allow American forces to provide tactical advice to local troops during combat operations.

entry.title: Big Fashion Still Hasn't Figured Out How to Pay a Living Wage
entry.content: Initiatives such as bringing Swedish study circles to Bangladesh to teach negotiation wonâ€™t work, labor advocates say.

entry.title: The 'CEO' of Hamas Who Found the Money to Attack Israel
entry.content: The militant group is said to be funded by a financial empire worth hundreds of millions of dollars, overseen by one man.
